channel.title: Minotaur Doomaxe
channel.description:
The strange name is from the inspiration i got for it :p If someone can animate this for me i could upload it in .mqo format
[img]http://img122.imageshack.us/img122/915/minotaurdoomaxe.png[/img]

item.title: Minotaur Doomaxe
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

Phaze One:

Correct me if I’m wrong but weapons don’t need animation.

If you want them to look epic (and have special attacks that don’t suck to hell) you’ll animate them.
@Gurk@n, Add some bloodstains and it should look pretty flipping awesome

Read full topic

item.title: Minotaur Doomaxe
item.dc:creator: @gurk gurk@n
item.description:
@gurk wrote:

[quote=“Orngequirrel, post:7, topic:336028”][quote author=gurk@n link=topic=432408.msg3175350#msg3175350 date=1270795630]

You need to make sure the model has triangulated faces, no lines, and is lined up correctly with the 317 Male Model. Also, you need to set priorities to 10 in DatMaker.

i dont get that kind of small error. i get a big one so the datmaker closes.

I have done all this and it loads fine in the datmaker before i make it a .dat. After that the model is either messed up, i just see grey or i get an error.
[/quote]
IIRC DatMaker cant support textures, and just turns them gray. The error you might be getting is “Contains lines.” and you should not worry about it, rather just ignore it, it doesnt affect anything. It might be messed up because you’re using quads in your model. To fix this open up your model in Metaseqouia and hold ctrl+a and then go to selected-> Triangulate selected faces. Hope this helps.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Minotaur Doomaxe
item.dc:creator: @Orngequirrel Orngequirrel
item.description:
@Orngequirrel wrote:

[quote=“gurk@n, post:6, topic:336028”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=432408.msg3175069#msg3175069 date=1270766254]
You need to make sure the model has triangulated faces, no lines, and is lined up correctly with the 317 Male Model. Also, you need to set priorities to 10 in DatMaker.
[/quote]

I have done all this and it loads fine in the datmaker before i make it a .dat. After that the model is either messed up, i just see grey or i get an error.[/quote]
IIRC DatMaker cant support textures, and just turns them gray. The error you might be getting is “Contains lines.” and you should not worry about it, rather just ignore it, it doesnt affect anything. It might be messed up because you’re using quads in your model. To fix this open up your model in Metaseqouia and hold ctrl+a and then go to selected-> Triangulate selected faces. Hope this helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Minotaur Doomaxe
item.dc:creator: @gurk gurk@n
item.description:
@gurk wrote:

rip4d:

You need to make sure the model has triangulated faces, no lines, and is lined up correctly with the 317 Male Model. Also, you need to set priorities to 10 in DatMaker.

I have done all this and it loads fine in the datmaker before i make it a .dat. After that the model is either messed up, i just see grey or i get an error.

item.title: Minotaur Doomaxe
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“gurk@n, post:3, topic:336028”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=432408.msg3174783#msg3174783 date=1270745756]
Correct me if I’m wrong but weapons don’t need animation.
[/quote]everything that moves ingame needs animation. i tried using datmaker but i just get errors.[/quote]

You jsut need right hand animation.

Read full topic
